title: Of metals and men
creator_credit: John Simmons, BBC-TV and Open University
brief_description: Considers the classification of metals according to their tendency to form compounds or their difficulty of extraction. Discusses the failings of such a classification scheme. Part of the Inorganic Chemistry Concepts and Case Studies series.
